snippet: For the past few weeks The New York Times has hosted visits by independent game developers from the local gaming community. On June 6, Igor Pusenjak, creator of Doodle Jump, and Zach Gage, creator of SpellTower, came by.
abstract: For the past few weeks The New York Times has hosted visits by independent game developers from the local gaming community. On June 6, Igor Pusenjak, creator of Doodle Jump, and Zach Gage, creator of SpellTower, came by.
